profile.description: A passionate technology lover who everyday tries to improve himself. With knowledge about JavaScript, CSS, HTML and frameworks like NodeJS or React; trying to learn more everyday with the best attitude.

hobbies.hobbyDescription: Music is what accompanies me everyday and moment in my life, as a rest and as a wonderful experience to disconnect a bit of the whole world.

projects.poke-app: A Pokemon browser which has been implemented with various functionalities, such as saving favorites pokemons, user login and the creation of teams, all these made with React and NodeJS.
projects.super-heroes-app: Using the API provided by Marvel, here you will find a wide material of super heroes, comics and the stories where all the fights and the feelings happen. Application made with React.
projects.light-music: This is a website made using NodeJS with tools like Express and Pug with a masonry layout which is one of my favorite UI desgings for its distinguish elegance.
projects.music-api: An API where you can register your favorite musicians and their albums, using NodeJS and express as the main and the most important tools to develop this little API.
